law.catch_line: Motions authorized by KRS 426.010 to 426.500 or 426.990 -- Limitation.
law.text: Any motion authorized by KRS 426.010 to 426.500 or 426.990 shall be commenced within two (2) years after the cause of the motion accrues.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1719.
